Bambu Indah

A radically distinctive boutique hotel in Ubud, unique luxury experience in a lush natural environment. Dense tropical jungle and river pools.

Located an hour’s drive to the north of Bali’s capital Denpasar, Ubud is already internationally acknowledged for its visual arts and performance, as well as exceptional arts and crafts, making it one of the most important cultural and artistic centres in Indonesia.

Posted 25. November 2018. 3 min read.

Aloe vera

Exceptional properties for your skin, guts and more.

Aloe Vera, a miracle plant known for its health benefits. Antiviral and antibacterial, it can improve the effectiveness of your diet.
